verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] wrenched the United States back to the brink of a constitutional showdown after a weekend of rage culminated in his demand for an investigation into claims that the Obama administration inserted a spy in his 2016 campaign .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: wrenched] [ARG1: the United States] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARGM-DIR: to the brink of a constitutional showdown] [ARGM-TMP: after a weekend of rage culminated in his demand for an investigation into claims that the Obama administration inserted a spy in his 2016 campaign] .

President Donald Trump has wrenched the United States back to the brink of a constitutional showdown after [ARG1: a weekend of rage] [V: culminated] [ARG2: in his demand for an investigation into claims that the Obama administration inserted a spy in his 2016 campaign] .

President Donald Trump has wrenched the United States back to the brink of a constitutional showdown after a weekend of rage culminated in his demand for an investigation into claims that [ARG0: the Obama administration] [V: inserted] [ARG1: a spy] [ARG2: in his 2016 campaign] .
